Draws a gold card from the deck for the player and then through then sends the following update to the listener: Hand GoldDeck ResourceDeck Turn PlayerScore If the deck is empty, the player will receive the ShowInvalidActionObj object to notify him that the deck is empty or the game is in the wrong state and the action can't be performed
